data.text: #AttentionPassengers. We are with high demand in our Customer Service channels. To save time, please go to https://t.co/OXUH9LR2xp, where you can find answers to documentation requirements and routes that we are operating, among other topics.

data.text: Our international flights to Peru have resumed, so when you are ready, we are ready. Connect in Lima with the largest network of destinations in Peru and South America; always with the safety and flexibility of our #NewWaysToFly. For more information visit https://t.co/pxuBw9jPIv https://t.co/9rcuyADJQ6
If you believe money is owed to you by LATAM, you have until December 18th, 2020 to file a claim in the chapter 11 bankruptcy. https://t.co/AOAEPE747s https://t.co/qBE23bgeKd

data.text: From today on, we’ll fly to Peru again! Go back to touring America leaving from Lima, counting on the safety and flexibility of our #NewWaysToFly. Learn about the operational destinations here https://t.co/bVu4y3FziV https://t.co/dncTTmlb3T

domain.name: Reoccurring Trends
domain.description: Twitter generated Trends that occur on a daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly basis such as Monday motivation.

data.text: The #PinkOctober month is coming to an end, but active awareness in the fight against breast cancer must continue. We share relevant data for you to bear in mind the importance of self-examination and annual check-up for early detection. #DoTheSelfExam https://t.co/SlCvFI5QJ6
Watch our latest chapter of “60 seconds”, where Andreas Schek answers your questions about purchase conditions and flexibility. https://t.co/tC6h1rV9GV

data.text: Did you know that the air system inside an airplane generates an effect comparable to maintaining a distance of 2 meters between people? Learn more in this study conducted by Boeing: https://t.co/gG4V9wYQUW #NewWaysToFly https://t.co/OTiTXXruQu

domain.name: Reoccurring Trends
domain.description: Twitter generated Trends that occur on a daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly basis such as Monday motivation.

data.text: Detecting breast cancer early can make all the difference. We invite you to watch this video and share it with all the people you know to find out how to do the self-exam. #PinkOctober #DoTheSelfExam https://t.co/TsUenB13k5

domain.name: Reoccurring Trends
domain.description: Twitter generated Trends that occur on a daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly basis such as Monday motivation.

data.text:
We’re together in the fight against breast cancer!
Today, we are committed to the world more than ever, and we wear pink to join this cause.
#PinkOctober #PerformTheSelfExam https://t.co/lLv2gcYAhA

#AttentionPassengers: if you have a trip soon, please check out all the government restrictions of the destination you will visit prior to your flight, since some of them request a negative PCR test or other requirements. More info here: https://t.co/tyTvBMogVv https://t.co/6AURWwDA7n
Your questions are answered today in the first chapter of 60 Seconds with María Fernández de Córdoba, our Product and Experience Manager. Join us with our #NewWaysToFly. https://t.co/oSQfbNWQyg

data.text: This is @bopinion article on a study conducted by MIT, in which they explain how HEPA filters and the constant renewal of air on our airplanes, contribute to the low odds of getting infected on a flight. #NewWaystoFly  https://t.co/WSCoefbQgY

Buy your ticket to fly until November 30, 2020 and you can reschedule your trip without penalty or fare difference to fly until May 31, 2021. Does not apply for December, January, and February. More information at https://t.co/UzNiWexiHv https://t.co/ugllFEN2Op

Diogo Nunes participated in flights that transported more than 680 tons of medical supplies from China to South America. Discover more about this mission that took more than 60 hours of flight time. https://t.co/HGLSGesVRJ https://t.co/jy1cy8QBfR

Sebastian Millar is part of the team that made possible the transport of stem cells from Germany to Chile, for 4 cancer patients who urgently needed them to fight this disease. Learn more about this #LATAMSolidaryPlane  https://t.co/5m2mBhKC5i https://t.co/mQZmymgh91

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: Emilia Rivadeneira was one of the people responsible for connecting +400 health professionals with patients throughout South America.  Learn about the work of #LATAMSolidaryPlane in times of COVID-19 https://t.co/xK9fWdY0se https://t.co/Fg6oAVfn4t
https://t.co/dX6BKg3VDn

We are committed to keeping you informed, that's why we present to you the operational status of our main destinations. #NewWaystoFly More information at https://t.co/scPwbsjVXt https://t.co/on0DX9KnOr
Enjoy more flexibility with our #NewWaysToFly. We extended our rescheduling policies until Dec. 2021. Find out more here https://t.co/k6cQ3rmi9O https://t.co/FHLNCtLciR

urls.title: Press Room | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Find out about our latest news, press releases and statements. Access information and resources for journalists and the media.

data.text: #AttentionPassengers: LATAM Airlines Argentina closes its operations in the country. LATAM Airlines Group and its other subsidiaries will continue serving routes to the US, Brazil, Chile, and Peru to connect Argentina to the world. More information at https://t.co/IArT5cqzMe

#ATTENTION: We have received alerts about offers and possible fraud through false accounts on social networks. We confirm to our passengers and users that LATAM only informs about its operations through its official channels. https://t.co/sXKxwtRui4

Our #NewWaysToFly include strict safety measures: There are HEPA filters in all our airplanes that maintain the cabin air at the same level as a hospital so that you can travel with peace of mind. https://t.co/auppYzotVO

We are committed to keeping you informed, that's why we present to you the operational status of our main destinations. #NewWaystoFly. More information at https://t.co/BQJKIP9PAY https://t.co/FpNyHbUAhA
Because we live in a new world, we have #NewWaystoFly, with more safety and flexibility than ever, so you can purchase and travel with complete peace of mind. https://t.co/adPEupml22

It’s so simple that it fits in a tweet! Buy with flexibility and reschedule your ticket once without penalties or fare difference, up to 12 months from the initial flight date. https://t.co/8K7d8x2AL8

#WeWillContinueToFly as we reorganize under U.S. Chapter 11 protection to navigate COVID-19 impacts, transforming our business to adapt to a new and evolving way of flying, and ensure long-term sustainability. Learn more: https://t.co/ZdWAGGhr9U https://t.co/bjYigYxcf1

We recently announced the reorganization process under Chapter 11 in the U.S. #WeWillContinueToFly and we want you to know that our operations will continue without any impact. For more information please visit https://t.co/mPQVA5eyVh

#NewWaysToFly is all about relearning and redefining how we travel today. We have implemented higher hygiene and safety standards and a new flexibility policy. More info at https://t.co/LGyWm6N57z https://t.co/02SeoRI0sZ

Your well-being is our most important concern. That's why we have adopted several measures to ensure that when you travel with us again, it will be in the safest way possible. #SafeFlight https://t.co/6Y9VrKZ1nK
We are grateful to the LATAM maintenance team that strives every day to give the best care to our fleet so that tomorrow we can do what we like most: Flying #FurtherTogether https://t.co/mA1I0wVFwk

#AttentionPassengers: For your safety and that of our personnel, we highly recommend the use of face masks during check-in, boarding and throughout your flight. From May 11th, the use of face masks will become mandatory at all times. For more information: https://t.co/sTDmQi4LXa https://t.co/dlU3mNSTKn

#AttentionPassengers: For your safety and the one of our collaborators, we highly recommend the use of masks from the moment of check-in, on boarding and throughout the whole flight. Learn more at https://t.co/sTDmQi4LXa

data.text: We want you to travel with peace of mind. Learn about the health and safety measures we are taking to protect you when you travel with us. For more information, please visit https://t.co/vHBr8s63P6. #FurtherTogether https://t.co/nI7gUr7izE

Today we bring you the story of how we transported life and hope from Brazil to Argentina on an exceptional flight. Thanks to the commitment of each one of the people who took part because they ensure that the world keeps on dreaming #FurtherTogether https://t.co/Hr7yGOdaCC

data.text: [IMPORTANT] We have received complaints about fake accounts on social networks contacting our clients. We will NEVER ask you for your secret passwords or your credit card number. We are reporting all cases and will continue protecting your security. https://t.co/QbZ5U2a27t

Going home is going back to where the heart is. We're proud to have taken more than 100,000 people back home. For them and for those who are still far away, we will keep on flying #FurtherTogether https://t.co/Dx1oM5XLlf

If you have a flight booked by April 30 and you cannot travel, don't worry. The amount you paid for your ticket will become personal credit for future travel up to December 31, 2020. Go to https://t.co/7I4nOM0CK5 https://t.co/uRxtgjA7jo
